entries.post: A well kept, healthy houseplant is a great way to brighten up any room in a home. This beautiful Widow's Thrill, also know as a Kalanchoe, perfectly complements the decor of the flat, howevａｎｄ ｉｓ ａ ｇｒｅａｔ, ｌｏｗ ｍａｉｎｔａｉｎａｎｃｅ ｐｌａｎｔ ｔｈａｔ ｔｈｒｉｖｅｓ ｉｎ ａｎｙ ｌｏｃａｔｉｏｎ ａｎｄ ｅｎｖｉｒｏｎｍｅｎｔ.
